ComicInfo.Title: Deadpool: The Musical
ComicInfo.Summary: Deadpool is about to be DEAD. Jump onboard readers, just as we kill our titular hero Deadpool!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:11:49. [CVDB312793]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Marte Gracia, Michael Babinski, Ryan Stegman
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jordan D. White, Nick Lowe
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Widow, Blind Al, Bob, Agent of HYDRA, Bucky Barnes, Bullseye, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Colossus, Cyclops, Daken, Deadpool, Death, Doctor Bong, Emma Frost, Enchantress, Eric O'Grady, Ghost, Grizzly, Headsman, Hit-Monkey, Hulk, Id the Selfish Moon, Iron Man, Macho Gomez, Mercury, Moon Knight, Norman Osborn, Orksa, Paladin, Punisher, Spider-Man, Spider-Woman, Thor, Weasel, White Lightnin', Wolverine
